Player History
Drafted in 13th round, 153rd overall pick, by Oakland in 2019...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/2019, off Richard Wagner (TOR)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/10/2019, off Alfonso Basaldua (LA)...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 2/5/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Released by New York on 4/1/2020...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 4/16/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
